segments.text: It's a strange tranquility that settles over this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, methodically drying a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one small plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the gentle movement of her hands, almost hypnotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink! It's absolutely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water cascades over the edge and onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely oblivious to such a major issue?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost incredible, her level of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside the window is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That peaceful view just doesn't match the internal chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just don't understand how someone could miss this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This poor kitchen is going to be completely flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damage will be a real problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a genuine sadness for the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
